/* --- CV layout helpers --- */
.cv-header{

/* Two-column layout (content + fixed date column).

:root{
  --date-col: 12rem;

}

.cv-item{
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr var(--date-col);

  align-items: baseline;
  margin-top: 0.75rem;
}

.cv-item .cv-left{ min-width: 0; }

.cv-item .cv-right{
  justify-self: end;
  text-align: right;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

/* Everything beneath a dated row stays in the left column */
.cv-item .cv-role,
.cv-item .cv-detail,
.cv-item .cv-bullets{
  grid-column: 1 / 2;
}

.cv-role{
  margin-top: 0.15rem;

}

  margin-top: 0.15rem;
}
.cv-bullets{

}
.cv-bullets li{
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

/* Mobile: stack date under entry */
@media (max-width: 700px){
  .cv-item{ grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
  .cv-item .cv-right{
    justify-self: start;
    text-align: left;
  }
}
